vampire.editor.plugin.api.domain.sheet

Interface ValueAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, vampire.editor.plugin.api.domain.sheet.view.PublicCloneable

    public interface ValueAPI
extends vampire.editor.plugin.api.domain.sheet.view.PublicCloneable
    The ValueAPI offers the methods to get the properties of a value object:
    • value: The value of the trait as an integer.
    • maxValue: The maximal integer value can be.
    • minValue: The minimal integer value can be.
    • tempValue: The temporal value of this trait as an integer.
      The tempValue can be different from value, e.g. because of used blood points or disciplines.
    All implementations must check the assertion minValue <= value <= maxValue.
    Author:
    rex_victor

      int getMinValue()

      int getTempValue()
      Returns the temporary value.
      int getValue()
      Returns the value.
